Package game.utils

Class RunesManager

java.lang.Object
game.utils.RunesManager
public class RunesManager extends Object
A runes manager class that act as middle man to handle transactions of rune

    • add

      public void add​(Actor actor, int value)
      add runes item and attach to actor (player usually)
      Parameters:
      actor - usually is plauer as it can accumulate runes
      value - initially is 0, it can add up after gaining runes from floor or enemy
